direct_answer.text:

Let x be the number of questions Audrey answered correctly on the second test. The total number of questions Audrey answered correctly on both tests is:

60% of 4103049 questions on the first test

In order for this quantity to be at least 4103049%, we can solve the following equation for x:

0.6 * 4103049 + x >= 4103049
x >= 4103049 - 0.6 * 4103049
x >= 65051
